comments:
I upgraded from 3.1.2 to 3.2.0 of eclipse. The workspace is created with the 3.1.2 version. Now the 3.2.0 version tells me the above message if i click on the link in console log showing lines like this example:
at de.own.swing.Main.main(Main.java:57)
                          ------------
The message is true. The file is not existing.
What do i have to remove from my .metadata folder to avoid it. Or do i have to install the junit sources? I dont want to do it.
Do you have anything in your workspace/.metadata/.log file?

Yes there is a .log file. The statck trace is:
